TopicTitle: Loans and going into the Red

Articles.Content: There should be some sort of option to take out loans or get bailed out in career mode. I haven't had problems with money yet, but I could see it happening, a "loan" option or Kerbal Govt bailout or something should be an option for players IMO and probably based on how far along you are in the game. Maybe some sort of special contract or series of contracts that pops up if you hit 0 money. Or perhaps selling off buildings/equipment or something like that in a big liquidation sale.
